title: Dubai Finance Authority Introduces Whistleblowing Regime - The National Law Review
content: Dubai Finance Authority Introduces Whistleblowing Regime  The National Law Review
description:
Speed Read


	
	On 7 April 2022, the Dubai Financial Services Authority (DFSA) introduced a new whistleblowing regime (the Regime).
	
	
	The Regime has significant parallels with that enforced
